alert.note: Alert for La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 24 at 11:46AM MDT until July 25 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM MDT THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Colorado, including the following areas, Otero, Prowers and Bent Counties. * WHEN...From 3 PM MDT this afternoon through this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Creeks and streams may rise out of their banks. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Strong thunderstorms will develop over the area this afternoon and spread eastward towards the Kansas border. Very heavy rainfall rates of up to 3 inches per hour will be possible which may cause flash flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County
